articles.title: Gautam Gambhir named "global mentor" for all Super Giants teams - ESPNcricinfo

articles.title: 'Pichle ek saal se jis tarah se matches huye hain...': Rizwan on IND vs PAK - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ahead of the match, Pakistan's star cricketer and the No.1 ranked T20I batter, Mohammad Rizwan, had his say on the blockbuster tie and Pakistan's preparation for the match. | Cricket
articles.content: In a little over a fortnight from now, cricket fans across the globe will be treated to a third edition of the India-Pakistan rivalry match, this time at the T20 World Cup at the Melbourne Cricket Gr… [+1732 chars]
